DOC.brief_summary: The objective research evaluate effectiveness couple Voluntary Counseling Testing HIV ( CVCT ) compare individual VCT ( IVCT ) prevent MTCT , increase preventive behavior minimize spousal abuse among HIV positive woman . We hypothesize offer CVCT decrease uptake VCT among woman . This research carry 3 antenatal clinic Dar e Salaam , Tanzania .
DOC.brief_title: Experimental Design Couple Counseling Testing Antenatal Clinics Dar e Salaam , Tanzania
